alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 25 at 9:49PM PST until February 26 at 12:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following areas, San Diego County Coastal Areas, San Diego County Mountains and San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...Until Midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, including the San Diego River, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered showers will continue this evening with brief heavy downpours still likely.
info.instruction: Monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
